translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_WAR_INTRO2:
It's a battle for the better card, and the highest card wins.
You have 20 chances to beat the Queen, and each victory adds to your total prize!
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_WAR_SUMMARY1: Who says there are no winners in war?
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_JOKER_INTRO2:
Every card you flip adds to your prize, but don't be fooled!
The Joker has randomly hidden several strikes; find 3 and the game is over!
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Change number of tickets and ticket cost here
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_WAR_INFO4: When 3 strikes were revealed the game ends and you get the prize you've reached!
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_WAR_INFO3: Reveal a SPADE or CLUB card and get a strike
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_WAR_INFO2: Reveal a Diamond card and progress on the prize bar
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_JOKER_INFO1: The war features 20 battles between you and the queen
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_INFO1: Select the number of tickets you want to play on.
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_JOKER_INFO2: Each Battle will have a different prize
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_JOKER_INFO3: In the battle, you and the queen will reveal a card
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_JOKER_INFO4: He who has the highest card wins the battle and the prize
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_JOKER_INFO5: Both of you have the same card? The battle continues! New cards will determine who wins
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_INFO7: Find the Joker and enter the Joker Bonus!
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_INFO4: To reveal the cards of the game, click ‘Reveal All’.
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_INFO5: Find a Queen of Diamonds card and win the prize shown on that card.
translations.QUEEN_OF_DIAMONDS_INFO6: Find 3 golden cards and enter the War Bonus game!
